casebody.data:
JAWAD A. SHAH, M.D., PC, Integrated Hospital Specialists, PC, Insight Anesthesia, PLLC, and Sterling Anesthesia, PLLC, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157951
COA: 340370 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 25, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Coalition Protecting Auto No-Fault to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on January 23, 2019, is accepted for filing.
